text: Mariyu memu vari (a pravaktala) adugu jadalanu (asarihim) anusarincevadu mariyu taurat lo migili unna satyanni dhrvaparace vadayina, maryam kumarudu isa (esunu) pampamu. Memu ataniki injil granthanni prasadincamu. Andulo margadarsakatvam mariyu jyoti unnayi mariyu adi taurat lo migili unna satyanni dhrvikaristundi mariyu daivabhiti gala variki margadarsakatvam mariyu hitopadesam kuda
